supportPage.title: Support
supportPage.content: Welcome to Invoi! We're here to assist you with any questions or concerns you may have. Please find our contact information below:
supportPage.workingHours: Monday to Friday: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM IST

privacyPolicyPage.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicyPage.intro: Welcome to Invoi! This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your personal information when you use our website and services.

sections.content: Invoices uploaded for processing are deleted after a day.
We upload the invoices to our servers for processing
We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to external parties
We implement reasonable security measures to protect your personal information

privacyPolicyPage.consentText: By using our website and services, you consent to the terms outlined in this Privacy Policy.
